query.statement: insert into tlxr_content ( tenant_id, portal_id, parent_id, content_id, content_name_id, portlet_id, content_style, content_desc, reg_date, reg_user_id, seq ) values ( :vo.tenantId, :vo.portalId, :vo.parentId, :vo.contentId, :vo.contentNameId, :vo.portletId, :vo.contentStyle, :vo.contentDesc, :vo.regDate, :vo.regUserId, :vo.seq )

update tlxr_content set #if ($vo.portletId && !$vo.portletId.equals("")) portlet_id=:vo.portletId, #end #if ($vo.contentStyle && !$vo.contentStyle.equals("")) content_style=:vo.contentStyle, #end #if ($vo.contentDesc && !$vo.contentDesc.equals("")) content_desc=:vo.contentDesc, #end #if ($vo.seq && !$vo.contentDesc.equals("")) seq=:vo.seq, #end #if ($vo.isActive && !$vo.isActive.equals("")) is_active=:vo.isActive, #end mod_date=:vo.modDate, mod_user_id=:vo.modUserId where tenant_id=:vo.tenantId and portal_id=:vo.portalId and content_id=:vo.contentId
update tlxr_content set parent_id=:vo.parentId where tenant_id=:vo.tenantId and portal_id=:vo.portalId and content_id=:vo.contentId
delete from tlxr_content where tenant_id=:vo.tenantId and portal_id=:vo.portalId and content_id=:vo.contentId

select * from tlxr_content where tenant_id=:vo.tenantId and portal_id in (select portal_id from tlxr_portal_group where child_portal like concat('%', :vo.portalId, '%') ESCAPED '_' or portal_id = :vo.portalId) and content_id=:vo.contentId

select a.*, b.message_name, b.lang_type from tlxr_content a, tlxr_message b where a.tenant_id=b.tenant_id and a.portal_id=b.portal_id and a.tenant_id=:vo.tenantId and a.portal_id=:vo.portalId and a.content_name_id=b.message_id #if ($vo.parentId && !$vo.parentId.equals("ROOT")) and a.parent_id=:vo.parentId #end #if (!$vo.searchKey.equals("") && $vo.searchWay.equals("contentName")) and (lower(b.message_name) like lower('$vo.searchKey')) ESCAPED '_' #end #if (!$vo.searchKey.equals("") && $vo.searchWay.equals("portletId")) and (lower(a.portlet_id) like lower('$vo.searchKey')) ESCAPED '_' #end #if (!$vo.searchKey.equals("") && $vo.searchWay.equals("contentId")) and (lower(a.content_id) like lower('$vo.searchKey')) ESCAPED '_' #end and b.lang_type=:vo.langType #if ($vo.refer.equals("name")) order by b.message_name, a.reg_date desc #else order by a.reg_date desc #end

select a.*, b.message_name, b.lang_type from tlxr_content a, tlxr_message b, tlxr_tree c where a.tenant_id=b.tenant_id and a.portal_id=b.portal_id and a.tenant_id=:vo.tenantId and a.portal_id=:vo.portalId and a.tenant_id=c.tenant_id and a.portal_id=c.portal_id and a.parent_id=c.node_id and c.use_personal = 'Y' and a.content_name_id=b.message_id #if ($vo.parentId && !$vo.parentId.equals("ROOT")) and a.parent_id=:vo.parentId #end #if (!$vo.searchKey.equals("") && $vo.searchWay.equals("contentName")) and (lower(b.message_name) like lower('$vo.searchKey')) ESCAPED '_' #end #if (!$vo.searchKey.equals("") && $vo.searchWay.equals("portletId")) and (lower(a.portlet_id) like lower('$vo.searchKey')) ESCAPED '_' #end #if (!$vo.searchKey.equals("") && $vo.searchWay.equals("contentId")) and (lower(a.content_id) like lower('$vo.searchKey')) ESCAPED '_' #end and b.lang_type=:vo.langType order by a.reg_date desc
update tlxr_tree set use_personal = :vo.usePersonal where tenant_id=:vo.tenantId and portal_id=:vo.portalId and node_id=:vo.nodeId
update tlxr_content set use_personal = :vo.usePersonal where tenant_id=:vo.tenantId and portal_id=:vo.portalId and content_id=:vo.contentId
